subject: Shipping to Poland
description_text:
Hi
Are you not delivering to Poland.
I can’t find the option of my country in you delivery settings, I found all
our neighbors so I assume it could be an error.
Let me know if we can resolve it together
Best regards
Rafał

conversations.body_text: Hi Rafał Wołczyk,  Customers in Poland can place orders directly through our Polish distributor, and the products will be shipped locally from Poland  https:/fmic.pl/elektronika/simracing?product_brand=Simsonn
